analysis.description:
Lotthereum.closeRound (/unique_chucks/28/0xc17016d7f3b7be3ab4f3468cd33913dc010dbf96.sol#180-197) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- Lotthereum.balances
	- Lotthereum.games

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/28/0xc17016d7f3b7be3ab4f3468cd33913dc010dbf96.sol#203:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/28/0xc17016d7f3b7be3ab4f3468cd33913dc010dbf96.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/28/0xc17016d7f3b7be3ab4f3468cd33913dc010dbf96.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_a' of Lotthereum.getNumber (/unique_chucks/28/0xc17016d7f3b7be3ab4f3468cd33913dc010dbf96.sol#204) is not in mixedCase
